virtual unsigned int cma::CMA_CType::getByteCount ( const char *  p  )  const [pure virtual]

Get the byte count of the first character pointed by p, which character is in a specific encoding.

Parameters:
p pointer to the character string
Returns:
true for punctuation, false for non punctuation.

bool cma::CMA_CType::isSpace ( const char *  p  )  const

Check whether is white-space character. White-space characters are " \t\n\v\f\r", and also space character in specific encoding.
